title: Framer for Android Wear
summary: Add custom overlays to your Android Wear device
description: Framer allows you to set custom overlays on your Android Wear device.Don't like the square screen? Add some round corners!Would you like to know what your app looks like on a round device and onlyhave a square one? Set a round frame.There are a few overlays to choose from. With the PRO version of Frameryou are also able to set your own images as an overlay. 320*320px 32bit PNGs with alpha channel are recommended. You can getthe unlocker for the PRO version either in the app or here:http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chrisxe.framerunlocker
descriptionHTML:
Framer allows you to set custom overlays on your Android Wear device.
Don't like the square screen? Add some round corners!
Would you like to know what your app looks like on a round device and only
have a square one? Set a round frame.


There are a few overlays to choose from. With the PRO version of Framer
you are also able to set your own images as an overlay.
320*320px 32bit PNGs with alpha channel are recommended. You can get
the unlocker for the PRO version either in the app or here:
http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chrisxe.framerunlocker
comments: Unfortunately error Bought the upgrade and every time I try to add my custom layout it force errors. HTC M8
Surprisingly appealing It's kind of amazing how much better a square watch interface looks with a slight rounding of the corners
Amazing ! IT makes my G watch look like a micro G watch R Still fugly though
This is a must for Smartwatch 3 people running a custom kernel who want the rounded corners back.
Great This app works great on LG g watch. The options are quite good.
